description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A new trainer is in town and avatars are invited for an intense workout session. Can your avatar keep pace with her or do you have a lazy couch potato on your hands? Compete with a friend's avatar or against an AI player.
description.short: A new trainer is in town and avatars are invited for an intense workout session. Can your avatar keep pace with her or do you have a lazy couch potato on your hands? Compete with a friend's avatar or against an AI player.
